name: milo
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a type of sorghum (= a grain grown in hot countries): The farm grows wheat, soya beans, and milo. We will start harvesting the peanuts and milo next month.
More examplesFewer examplesWhen they stopped growing cotton, they replanted the fields with milo and other grains.The price of milo seed has doubled in the last five years.They have set up a new factory that makes ethanol from fermented milo.The pests destroy crops such as milo, wheat, and watermelons.
